author: Charlotte Alter
title: For College Students, Coronavirus Means Love Interrupted
description: It was the Monday of the last week of classes before break, and the first whiff of spring was in the air at Stony Brook University. That was the night that Sean started talking to a girl. They were both political science majors, with almost exactly the same o…
